example.eg: Smith explored unmapped regions of the continent.
example.egtrans: 史密斯四处探索大陆上尚未绘入地图的地区。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 地域，地区, 行政区域

example.eg: The rain in this region can cause floods.
example.egtrans: 这个地区的降雨可能会导致洪灾发生。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 地区, 范围, 区域

example.eg: We should travel through the peaceful regions of the country.
example.egtrans: 我们应当穿过这个国家中的和平地带。

example.eg: The Arabian Desert is a desert region covering a vast area in the Middle East.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 沙漠地区, 各地区, 各区域, 各处

dsense.name: in the neighborhood of [sth] (US), somewhere in the region of [sth] (UK)

example.eg: The Red Cross had difficulty getting aid to the remote region after the earthquake.
